(alumna) Past-Chair Retired Attorney Sheila K. Dickison, Ph. D. Chair of the Board Associate Director for Academic Programs – Bob Graham Center for Public Service (Retired) Alix Alexis Development Chair Financial Advisor – Merrill Lynch Kelly Sleeper Secretary Human Resources Professional Paula DeBoles-Johnson Secretary Employment Engagement and Performance Manager – Leon County Government Anne Toulouse (alumna) At-Large Founder and Managing Director – Pleiades Partners LLC David Ashburn At-Large Attorney – Greenberg Traurig Jill W. Varnes, Ed.D. Student Affairs Chair Professor Emerita – UF College of Health & Human Performance Bill Oliver Finance Chair President – OliverSperry Renovation Board Members Ryan Tucker Finance Chair/Treasurer CPA – Purvis Gray & Company Gayla Parks Insurance Agent – State Farm Kathryn Bell (alumna) Retired Lady Dhyana Ziegler, Ph.D. President/CEO – ZCreators LaShondia Kendrick Vice President of Strategy and Operations – Comcast Central Division Linda Jenkins Retired Educator Lynn H. Leverty, Ph.D. Lecturer – University of Florida Nicholas Appelo (alumnus) Investment Analyst, Capco Asset Management Pamela Paulk (alumna) Retired President – Johns Hopkins Medicine International Ryancy St. Eloi Student Board Representative - North Florida Natasha Counts Student Board Representative - Central Florida Betty Jensen FSU International Student Advisor Beverly Barrington Retired FAMU Administrator Staff Members Shawn J. Woodin, Ed.D. President/CEO With years of experience directing scholarship programs and student housing, I am thrilled to be SSF’s President/CEO. Our residents inspire me to elevate the foundation’s profile and attract new supporters to our cause. When not at SSF, I spend time with my wife and family—and together we occasionally travel to far-flung places to visit friends and family. E-mail Teresa Turner Director of Student Life & Leadership Hi, I’m Teresa and I am the Director of Student Affairs for our Central Florida Campus! In my role I am lucky enough to meet our students during the interview process and hear their powerful stories. But the real joy comes in watching them grow into these highly productive adults who are out there every day achieving their dreams. My time with SSF goes beyond the word rewarding because the impact our residents have made on me is something I will always carry with me. E-mail Brian Marquez Development Officer Hi, I’m Brian and I’m thrilled to join the SSF team as our new Development Officer. I fell in love with fundraising as an undergraduate student when I participated in FSU’s Dance Marathon, and I’m excited to bring this passion to support the Foundation and our residents. When I’m not at work, I enjoy spending time outdoors, reading a good book, or attending various community events with my partner Stevie. E-mail Dale Dixon Director of Maintenance – Central Florida Hello, my name is Dale and I’m the Maintenance Director for Central FL. I look after all the resident houses in Gainesville and Ft. Myers. I have been doing maintenance for over 25 years and I really enjoy helping people. E-mail Jesula “JJ” Jeannot Student Life & Leadership Manager I’m Jesula Jeannot, I’m stoked to join the SSF Family as the Student Life and Leadership Manager. I have a range of expertise in leading initiatives that empower young people through strategic programs and community engagement. Outside of work, I enjoy reading, taking long trail walks, and writing. I also have a passion for cleaning and decorating, which allows me to express my creativity and attention to detail. E-mail Norman Moore Director of Maintenance – North Florida Hi, I’m Norman! As the Director of Maintenance for our North Florida Homes my job centers on keeping all 17 of them up and running. Even though it can be a daunting task at times, I do get the privilege to meet and learn a little about our incredible residents along the way. After almost 16 years I have seen many students come and go, and I look forward to meeting the future residents of SSF. E-mail John Stewart Senior Maintenance Technician – North Florida Hi, I’m John Stewart! As a maintenance technician for over 15 years now, and have been at Southern Scholarship Foundation for two years. I enjoy meeting so many great people along the way! E-mail Samirah Abellard Student Life Assistant – North Florida Hey! I’m Samirah, a graduate student at Florida State University studying Public Health. I’m the house manager for the ADK Scholarship House as well as the Student Affairs Assistant for North Florida. When I’m not doing school work or helping out around the SSF office, I like to build legos or watch a good show. E-mail Lisa Heil Director of Development With 19 years of fundraising experience, I am so excited to support and help provide higher education opportunities to deserving students building their futures! When I’m not working I enjoy the simple things in life… spending time with my family and friends. Most of all being a mom to my sweet girl and a wife to my husband. We enjoy spending time at the beach or finding new places to travel together. E-mail Iván Peñafiel Communications Specialist Hello, everyone! My name is Iván, and I excited to form a part of SSF as the new Communications Specialist leading our social media and online platform efforts. Getting the opportunity to apply my creative visual and language skills to the mission of the foundation is a dream come true, and I look forward to increasing public awareness of the incredible work that SSF does for the students and future leaders of the community. E-mail Brad Wonsch Accounting & Operations Specialist Hi, I’m Brad, and I’m excited for the opportunity to join the SSF team as the new accountant! With a passion for numbers and a heart for making a difference, I’m proud to be part of this mission. When I’m not crunching numbers, I’m busy being a dad to four awesome kids, including a lively set of twins who keep me on my toes. E-mail Chrissy Lee Program Coordinator, Student Life & Leadership Hey! My name is Chrissy Lee and I am so excited to bring my experience as a Gifted Ed Program Coordinator and join the SSF family as the Program Coordinator… E-mail Privacy Policy Find us on: Facebook page opens in new window YouTube page opens in new window Linkedin page opens in new window Instagram page opens in new window TikTok page opens in new window Non-discrimination policy SSF does not and shall not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion/creed, gender, gender expression, age, national origin (ancestry), disability, marital status, sexual orientation, or military status, in any of its activities or operations Resources SSF Stories Blog Documents Events Forms Southern Scholarship Foundation 2025 Home Foundation About SSF Board and Staff House Directory Impact Financial Statements Scholarship Rent-Free, Cooperative Living How to Apply FAQs Residents Leadership Development House Directory Resources SSF Stories Blog Documents Events Forms Engage Engagement Give Now Partners Smarter Ways to Give SucceSSFul Alumni Giving Communities Contact Menu Go to Top

About — Sea Breeze Properties 0 Skip to Content About About What We Do Projects Mixed Use Residential Office Retail Contact Open Menu Close Menu About About What We Do Projects Mixed Use Residential Office Retail Contact Open Menu Close Menu Folder: About Back About What We Do Folder: Projects Back Mixed Use Residential Office Retail Contact About Sea Breeze Properties Formed in 1998, Sea Breeze Properties, LLC is a renowned San Diego Real Estate development, investment, and management firm. The versatile team shares a goal to create a more livable, walkable, and environmentally friendly San Diego. Each project speaks for itself through attention to detail, customer driven details, tasteful architecture, and focus on placemaking to benefit the surrounding community. What We Do Prioritizing unique real estate development opportunities in San Diego County. Extensive Skillset Land acquisition, Planning, Entitlements, Infrastructure, Vertical Construction, Leasing and Asset/Property Management. Environmentally Conscious State-of-the-art solutions for projects that are sensitive to their environment. Strategic With over $500 million In development throughout San Diego, CA, we have strategic partnerships in private equity and Commercial institutions. Gary Levitt President / Founder Gary is responsible for the overall vision, direction, and financing for all Sea Breeze Properties projects. His lifetime of knowledge and experience is personally applied to every aspect of a project’s development: from land acquisition, to entitlements, to design and function, through site work and vertical construction, and ultimately through leasing and property management. Gary is hands-on and face forward. Darren Levitt Vice President Darren’s oversight and intuitive management is an integral element to all SBP projects. Working closely with Gary and all members of the team, Darren is also directly responsible for contract negotiations, leasing & marketing activities, design and asset management. Meet the Team Gary Levitt PRESIDENT/FOUNDER Gary is responsible for the overall vision, direction, and financing for all Sea Breeze Properties projects. His lifetime of knowledge and experience is personally applied to every aspect of a project’s development: from land acquisition, to entitlements, to design and function, through site work and vertical construction, and ultimately through leasing and property management. Gary is hands-on and face forward. Darren Levitt VICE PRESIDENT Darren’s oversight and intuitive management is an integral element to all SBP projects. Working closely with Gary and all members of the team, Darren is also directly responsible for contract negotiations, leasing & marketing activities, design and asset management. Contact Us | Southern Breeze Golf Tours a
Division of Gardner Travel Service, Inc. since
1979 1.877.510.4653 CONTACT US We are open from 8:30am
until 5:30pm Monday through
Friday (CST) to answer your questions. Our typical response time for
your
email request ranges from 3 hours to as many as 72 depending upon the
availability
of onsite resources and those of the golf clubs, country clubs and
resorts/lodging
establishments, as well as, any variations you may request from our
listed
programs. For those inquirers requesting a trip within two weeks
of 
play, we will give you a priority due to your need to establish a plan.
At any rate, we will respond to your requests as quickly as possible
and
as soon as we have all components of your package confirmable. Also,
keep
in mind that some of our golf packages are time sensitive requiring an
advance purchase to receive the lowest available rates. You may send your general email
inquiries to
the
following address: golf@gardnertravel.com Southern
Breeze Golf Tours Dallas-Ft
Worth ,
Texas MAIL
TO Southern
Breeze Golf Tours P.O.
Box 160 Rio Vista, Texas 76093 O UR S TAY
'N P LAY L IST The
San Antonio area has some incredible golf opportunities along with some
of Texas' best tourist spots. Take a quick tour of The Alamo. Then
mosey on down to the Riverwalk. The city comes alive at night along
this famous stretch of the San Antonio River. PLAY
(OR ADD) ANY OF THESE SAN ANTONIO AREA CLUBS WITH ANY OF THE ABOVE
ITINERARIES The
Quarry | The
Resort Course @ La Cantera | The Palmer Course @ La Cantera | TPC San
Antonio | Canyon Springs | Hyatt Hill Country | The Bandit | Silverhorn | The Republic The Austin music
scene has been a favorite hangout for Willie and the boys and a host of
other notable characters for some time now. But you will also find some
of the finest courses to be played in Texas by Nicklaus, Palmer,
Morrish and more. Nobody knows the Austin golf scene better than
Southern Breeze Golf Tours. Play
all 3 Robert
Trent Jones Sr. courses and enjoy stay at either the Inn or 1/2/3-Bedroom villas! PLAY
(OR ADD) ANY OF THESE AUSTIN HILL COUNTRY CLUBS WITH ANY OF THE ABOVE
ITINERARIES: Falconhead | Avery
Ranch | Teravista | Grey
Rock | Lost Pines @ Hyatt Regency
Resort | Star Ranch | ShadowGlen A
visit to the DFW area offers up some unique playing opportunities! Tee
it up at The Tribute, 18 holes of some of the most remarkably
replicated holes of famous Scottish links like The Old Course,
Carnoustie and Muirfield. Or enjoy a round at Tour18 for a carbon-copy
of some of the most exciting holes in the U.S. like Harbor Town, Bay
Hill and Amen Corner at Augusta National. Then, there is the
first-of-its-kind Cowboys Golf Club, the NFL themed club paying homage
to America's Team. Enjoy the Play Around experience with even more
options for some of North Texas' finest courses. PLAY
(OR ADD) ANY OF THESE DALLAS/FT. WORTH AREA CLUBS WITH ANY OF THE ABOVE
ITINERARIES: Tour 18 | The
Tribute | Bridlewood | Coyote Ridge | Old American (private) | Cowboys Golf Club | Texas
Rangers Golf Club The
Houston area has offers some of our newest golf designs for those in
search of a reasonable game and quality course layouts. The last few
years has provided the Houston area with significant growth in course
building. PLAY
(OR ADD) ANY OF THESE HOUSTON AREA CLUBS WITH ANY OF THE ABOVE
ITINERARIES: Cypresswood | Wildcat | Tour 18 | Blackhorse | High Meadow Ranch | The Golf Club of Houston Two of Florida's greats! Headquarters
for the PGA of America, PGA National Resort's courses are kept in
tournament condition all year long. And at Innisbrook Golf
Resort you'll enjoy 72 holes of championship golf, including the famed
Copperhead and Island Courses, all just minutes from your room or suite. The
southern regions of the Eastern Seaboard are a natural setting for some
of this country's most beautiful and highest-revered golf links. Play
it down on the ocean at either Kiawah Island, Wild Dunes or Hilton
Head. Discover the timeless appeal of America's premier mountain resort
at The Homestead. Check out Red Sky! These two magnificent
18s are a handful, eyeful and a mind-full! Nearby Keystone Resort
offers
two 18-hole courses - The Ranch Course and The River Course …in some of
the most spectacular settings! We also offer slightly lower-elevation
golf getaways in Santa Fe. Enjoy Black Mesa, Towa and Paako Ridge in
Albuquerque. A
Western golf adventure can be just
what the doctor ordered. Tee it up in Scottsdale with more quality
desert courses than you can shake your sticks at. Take a thrill-packed
tour of the Oregon coastline to play Pumpkin Ridge and Bandon Dunes -
two of Oregon's most fabled golf stops. This year make it a Western
adventure! The
Southern Winds can offer up a game to play
nearly 365 days of the year. EXCITEMENT and ANTICIPATION!
Its the feeling
you get
standing on
the #1 tee box and about to play your first shot on a course that you
have had on your esteemed bucketlist. You've planned all year to get
here
and if you are a Southern Breeze
customer you can focus on your game ahead because all of the details
have been meticulously arranged. This is life the way its suppose to
be... or at least on a golf trip. Browse our top-notch golf programs
and you will find not only the quality you expect but also a great low
rate with a full-service golf planner to work one-on-one with you. We
call it "the best of both worlds" - a knowledgeable golf planner and a
great low rate! This is what we
offer as a commitment to our golf customers and we
would honor the opportunity to assist you in finding the games on your
bucketlist. With
Southern Breeze, you come first. If when
you play is an important factor to you and your playing
partners, we get there first. You
can be assured that our tee
times are generally the best of the
day because we access the tee sheets well before the general
public and usually 30-120 day days in advance. And although we
serve foursomes and larger groups,
we can also assist the single player in many cases. Our unique advance
planning service insures that you play when you want to.
Whether it is teeing it up at one of the many resort destinations that
we represent or our individual and highly-ranked golf clubs listed
throughout our web site, you can rest assured with a premium
golf tee time from Southern Breeze Golf Tours. Catch a Southern
Breeze! Sincerely, Randy C. Gardner President LOW DISCOUNTED PACKAGE RATES | PREFERRED TEE TIMES | INDIVIDUALS OR GROUPS We can
also
package and assist in the
following golf-themed trips: CORPORATE

Home - Coastal Breeze Partners - Strategic Capital Solutions About Approach Focus Team Portfolio News Contact Investor Login About Approach Focus Team Portfolio News Contact Investor Login Coastal Breeze Partners TM Building Great Middle Market Businesses 2024 Year Founded Combined number of years of investment experience Number of businesses Founders have invested in Actively Managed Investments About Who We Are Coastal Breeze Partners, headquartered In Boca Raton, Florida, is a lower middle market private equity firm that specializes in control investments across the United States. Coastal Breeze Partners combines deep sector expertise in industrial sub sectors and business service sub sectors with a proven track record of value creation. We partner and align our interests with talented management teams to help companies and business owners achieve their full potential. We have invested in more than 80 businesses over the past 25 years. Why We Are Different Our senior team has extensive principal investment, transactional and operational experience. This provides us with a value-added approach to develop a tailored investment thesis in order to transform businesses. By combining our deep sector expertise with a hands-on approach, we help build, grow and enhance the businesses in which we invest. Prior to founding Coastal Breeze, Matthias served as Managing Director at OpenGate Capital, a global mid market private equity firm. As Head of OpenGate’s North American industrials investment team, Matthias focused on transformational value creation opportunities in chemicals, ingredients, building products, industrials and distribution. CLOSE Brian is a founding partner of Coastal Breeze Partners and has over 25 years of investing, merger & acquisition and corporate finance experience. Brian has completed over 40 transactions for businesses across multiple industries, including business services, industrial, consumer, retail, automotive & heavy-duty, financial services, packaging, chemicals, and healthcare. Brian’s investment activities included control buyout transactions, as well as non-control recapitalization transactions. Brian also completed ongoing work with portfolio companies, including the strategic planning, operational reviews, management recruiting, financing and restructuring needs, add-on acquisitions and exit transactions. Prior to founding Costal Breeze, Brian was the co-founder and managing partner of Harbor Beach Capital, where he continues to actively manage two platform investments. Prior to founding Harbor Beach Capital, Brian served as Managing Director at Sun Capital Partners, a global private equity firm focused on investing in lower and middle market companies. Prior to Sun Capital, Brian was a Vice President in the Corporate Finance group at Stephens, Inc. Prior to that, Brian served as a Vice President with the investment banking group at Bear, Stearns & Co. Inc., and as Manager of Corporate Development with AutoNation, Inc. Brian received a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, cum laude, with dual majors in Economics and Finance from Creighton University's Heider College of Business. Matthias is a founding partner of Coastal Breeze Partners and has 25 years of investing, merger & acquisition and corporate finance experience. Matthias has completed over 30 transactions for businesses across multiple jurisdictions, sectors and types. Prior to founding Coastal Breeze, Matthias served as Managing Director at OpenGate Capital, a global lower-to-middle market private equity firm. As Head of OpenGate’s North American industrials investment team, Matthias focused on transformational value creation opportunities in chemicals, ingredients, building products, industrials and distribution. Prior to OpenGate, Matthias was a Vice President at Sun European Partners, the London based investment arm of Sun Capital Partners, a global private equity firm focused on investing in lower and middle market companies. Prior to Sun Capital, Matthias worked in investment banking at Goldman Sachs in Frankfurt and at Deutsche Bank in London. As part of a dual degree Matthias received a Master of Business Administration from University of Pittsburgh, KATZ Graduate School of Business and a Master of Business Administration from EBS Universität für Wirtschaft und Recht.
